questions.question: A pilot is cleared to taxi to the runway in use without a hold short clearance. To get there, the aircraft must cross two taxiways and one runway. This authorizes the pilot to taxi to

answers.1: the runway in use, but must hold short.
answers.2: the runway in use, but further clearance is required to cross each taxiway and runway en route.
answers.3: position on the runway without further clearance.
answers.4: the runway in use, but further clearance is required to cross the other runway.
